title: Goal, policy for sustainable development, Nigeria

content.question: Describe the goal of sustainable development. Identify one sector of Nigeria’s economy in which sustainable development has been a serious challenge. Explain how economic factors influence environmental policy in Nigeria.

frqParts.text: Describe the goal of sustainable development. Identify one sector of Nigeria’s economy in which sustainable development has been a serious challenge. Explain how economic factors influence environmental policy in Nigeria.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
